thread.title: Justice Department Probes Colleges’ Early-Decision Admission Practices - WSJ

author: Melissa Korn
title: Justice Department Probes Colleges’ Early-Decision Admission Practices - WSJ

organizations.name: justice department probes colleges’ early-decision admission practices - wsj

text:
The U.S. Department of Justice is looking into whether communications among officials at competing colleges about early-decision applicants violate antitrust laws, the latest in a series of investigations the federal government has launched into higher-education admission practices in recent months.

The Justice Department sent letters to a number of colleges and universities this week asking that they preserve emails and other messages detailing agreements with other schools regarding their communications with one another...
